definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Conclusion The infection rate of threadworm in our children is decreasing.
sentences.chinese: 结论西宁市儿童蛲虫的感染呈下降趋势。

sentences.english: I believe these are eggs (ova) of the Enterobius vermicularis, a pinworm, that often habits in perianal areas.
sentences.chinese: 我相信这是蛲虫卵，一个蛲虫，往往习惯在周围区域。

sentences.english: Health education is in the significant effect in enterobiasis control.
sentences.chinese: 表明健康教育措施对控制蛲虫感染效果显著。

sentences.english: Oxyurid ova were examined for children younger than 12 by cellophane anal swab.

definition: ascariasis/infectation by parasitic roundworm Ascaris lumbricoides
tinea cruris, fungal skin infection of the groin/dermatomycosis, esp. sexually transmitted/jock itch
gonococcus/Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the pathogen causing gonorrhea
vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis
